hasMenuItem.name: Eggs Rancheros
hasMenuItem.description: 2 eggs sunny side up. Served with fresh homemade salsa, sour cream, black beans, tortillas, and toast.

hasMenuItem.name: Eggs & Specialty Sausage
hasMenuItem.description: Choice of Chorizo, Italian, Turkey, or Lamb Merguez. Served with 2 eggs any style, breakfast potatoes, and toast.

hasMenuItem.name: Sophie's Steak & Eggs
hasMenuItem.description: AAA 8 oz striploin, 2 eggs, breakfast potatoes, and toast.

hasMenuItem.name: Pastrami & Eggs
hasMenuItem.description: Eggs scrambled with smoked pastrami beef. Served with breakfast potatoes and toast.

hasMenuItem.name: Scrambled Eggs with Jack Cheese
hasMenuItem.description: Scrambled eggs with jack cheese wrapped in a flour tortilla. Served with fresh homemade salsa, guacamole, black beans and house salad

hasMenuItem.name: Ham & Cheddar Omelette
hasMenuItem.description: With breakfast potatoes and toast.

hasMenuItem.name: Jimmy's Greek Omelette
hasMenuItem.description: With feta, sour cream and dill sauce and our Spanish sauce. Served with breakfast potatoes and toast.

hasMenuItem.description: With onions, peppers and ham. Served with breakfast potatoes and toast. Add jack or cheddar cheese for an additional charge.

hasMenuItem.name: Deluxe Veggie Omelette
hasMenuItem.description: With fresh spinach, Spanish sauce, sautéed onions and mushrooms. Served with breakfast potatoes, black beans and toast.

hasMenuItem.name: Sophie's Organic Granola Breakfast
hasMenuItem.description: Our granola is made with oats, nuts and dried fruit. With fresh fruit cup and 2% milk. With fresh fruit cup and yogurt for an additional charge.

hasMenuItem.name: Sophie's Breakfast
hasMenuItem.description: Gluten-free. 2 Poached eggs, gluten-free toast, house salad and fresh fruit cup.

hasMenuItem.name: Organic Hot Oatmeal
hasMenuItem.description: Made with organic rolled oats. Served with Canadian maple syrup and fresh fruit cup.

hasMenuItem.name: Light Breakfast
hasMenuItem.description: Gluten-free. 2 Poached eggs served with applewood smoked bacon or ham, gluten-free toast and house salad or fresh fruit cup.

hasMenuItem.description: Take home a bottle of our famous hot sauce!

hasMenuItem.name: House Salad
hasMenuItem.description: Fresh lettuce, cucumber, tomato, and shredded carrots. Served with our non-dairy house dressing or olive oil and red wine vinegar on the side.

hasMenuItem.name: Caesar Salad
hasMenuItem.description: Romaine lettuce tossed with our house-made Caesar dressing, croutons, and parmesan cheese.

hasMenuItem.name: Fresh Spinach Feta Salad
hasMenuItem.description: Fresh spinach leaves tossed with feta cheese, sliced mushrooms, applewood smoked bacon, grated egg, and house dressing.

hasMenuItem.name: Sophie’s Style Greek Salad
hasMenuItem.description: Our Greek salad includes mixed greens with feta cheese, olives, tomato, cucumber, bell peppers, red onions, olive oil, red wine vinegar, and oregano.

hasMenuItem.name: Jimmy’s Greek Burger
hasMenuItem.description:
Jimmy's Greek burger,  6 oz Greek patty covered in sour cream, feta, dill sauce topped with fresh lettuce tomato, onion, mayo and pickle

"Make it Greek chicken burger" for an additional charge

hasMenuItem.name: Sophie’s Cosmic Workout Burger
hasMenuItem.description: 6oz lean beef patty topped with mushrooms, applewood smoked bacon, lettuce, tomato, mayo, and pickle, with cheese. Served with fries and house salad.

hasMenuItem.name: Deluxe Beef Burger
hasMenuItem.description:
A 6oz patty of fresh seasoned beef with lettuce, tomato, onion, mayo, and pickle.
Add cheese for an additional charge.

hasMenuItem.name: BC Wild Sockeye Salmon Burger
hasMenuItem.description:
6 oz BC salmon fillet 
 with lettuce, tomato, onion, pickle and mayo. Served with homemade tartar sauce or garlic aioli.

hasMenuItem.name: California Chicken Burger
hasMenuItem.description: Served with guacamole, jack cheese, bacon, tomato  lettuce,  onion, and pickle. your choice of  Cajun spices, peanut satay or grilled plain.

hasMenuItem.name: Chicken Strips
hasMenuItem.description: 5 piece strips with fries and plum sauce.

hasMenuItem.name: Sophie’s Nut & Vegetable Deluxe Burger
hasMenuItem.description: The Legendary Sophie's Veggie patty with fresh tomato, lettuce, onion, pickle, and mayo. Served on a toasted multigrain bun, topped with homemade fruit chutney and your choice of fries, house salad, soup, or black beans.

hasMenuItem.name: Sophie’s Crunchy Falafel Plate
hasMenuItem.description: Ground chickpeas, onion, garlic, and parsley, deep-fried. Served with fresh greens, tomato, cucumber, onion, hummus, and tahini sauce. Includes fries, house salad, soup, or black beans.

hasMenuItem.name: Deluxe Vegetarian Sandwich
hasMenuItem.description: Cream cheese, guacamole, mild roasted red pepper spread, cucumber, lettuce, tomato, and mayo. Served with house salad and fresh fruit cup.

hasMenuItem.name: Vegan Tofu Scramble
hasMenuItem.description:
Scrambled tofu with soy milk, turmeric and nutritional yeast. Served with breakfast potatoes and toast
Add vegan sausage for an additional charge.

review.reviewBody: So great!  Not only was the food delicious but they made a heart shaped pancake for valentines day
Best chicken ceasar wrap I've ever had! The greek chicken burger is really good too!

I've honestly always doubted the ability to deliver a good eggs Benny, but they nailed it. Perfect runny yolk, Holland side seperate so it doesn't congeal. Perfect!!! Satisfied  a craving I've had for weeks

The staff are so accommodating, and helpful! I so appreciate them, being able to modify, my order .... grateful and thankful! 
 My order was delicious, Western  omelet and French toast!!
Sophie's has the BEST pancakes in Vancouver :)
